# isComplex128

> Test if a value is a [128-bit complex number][@stdlib/complex/float64].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var isComplex128 = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-complex128' );
```

#### isComplex128( value )

Tests if a value is a [128-bit complex number][@stdlib/complex/float64].

```javascript
var Complex64 = require( '@stdlib/complex/float32' );

var x = new Complex64( 1.0, 3.0 );

var bool = isComplex128( x );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

```javascript
var Complex64 = require( '@stdlib/complex/float32' );
var Complex128 = require( '@stdlib/complex/float64' );
var isComplex128 = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-complex128' );

var out = isComplex128( new Complex128( 3.0, 1.0 ) );
// returns true

out = isComplex128( new Complex64( 2.0, 2.0 ) );
// returns false

out = isComplex128( {} );
// returns false

out = isComplex128( null );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->

<section class="links">

[@stdlib/complex/float64]: https://github.com/stdlib-js/stdlib

</section>

<!-- /.links -->
